# kCIInputRadius1Key

**Global Variable**

A key to get or set the geometric radius value of a Core Image filter.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIInputRadius1Key: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key needs to be an `NSNumber` instance.
title: kCIInputRadius1Key
